level.heading: Certification.
level.text: Each part of the District of Columbia Municipal Regulations, each permanent supplement of the District of Columbia Municipal Regulations, and the District of Columbia Register shall contain a certificate by the Administrator stating that such part contains all documents required to be published pursuant to this subchapter as of the date of such certificate.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: The 2012 amendment by D.C. Law 19-168 deleted "the District of Columbia Statutes-at-Large" following "Each part of."

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 2-153
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-153, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 2-505.
